data.description:
Step into the heart of the world’s oldest rainforest with Julaymba, an award-winning Mixed Reality experience that brings the Daintree Rainforest to life. In the lush expanse of North Tropical Queensland, Australia, journey alongside the Eastern Kuku Yalanji people, the Indigenous Traditional Owners of this UNESCO World Heritage site, as they share their timeless stories and deep connection to the land.

{398598786177288}

In Julaymba, the Eastern Kuku Yalanji word for Daintree, you’ll participate in a traditional smoking ceremony, learn the Indigenous language, and feel the wawu, or spirit, of the rainforest as you splash in waterfalls, encounter a giant cassowary up close, and see luminous fungi glow from your hands.

This unique educational experience intertwines culture and nature, offering an intimate, immersive journey where every moment is a chance to learn and connect with Country.

{1226118158380545}

Awards
- ‘Best in Australia’ and ‘Best in VR Interactive Immersive Experiences’ - Australian XR Festival 2023
- ‘Best XR experience’ - XR Awards 2024
- ‘Official Selection’ - SXSW Sydney 2023

–

Additional information
- This app contains additional immersive content that needs to be downloaded from the cloud.
- A portion of all revenue generated by Julaymba goes directly back to the Eastern Kuku Yalanji community, supporting their cultural preservation efforts and ensuring a sustainable future for the Daintree rainforest.
